metadata.name: Solar Maximum Aurora Borealis Corona
metadata.description:
The magnificent show that is a corona during a northern lights display will stop you in your tracks. This awe-inspiring moment was over the Calgary, Alberta area on March 24, 2023 at around midnight MST.
I had 4 Ukrainian refugees with me viewing this first show and it was a magical moment. You will receive this unwatermarked HD file during a truly colorful part of this display.

I am one of Alberta's original aurora chasers and my astrophotography has been used to advance space physics research. View chasingsteve.com to understand Alberta's unique role in the night sky.
https://solarsystem.nasa.gov/people/466/christy-turner/
